item.title: Jason Mraz - I Won't Give Up
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Won't Give Up - Jason Mraz
Using the chords: A Bm7 C C# D Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU or D DU U (or a combination of both)
Notes: The audio has been slightly lowered (1 tone) to make it more suitable for the ukulele
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Rolling Stones - (I Can't Get No) Satisfaction (Mono Version)
item.description:
Satisfaction (I Can’t Get No) by The Rolling Stones. It’s been digitally lowered by 4 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. For educational use. Chords Used: C F G
If you found this video useful please subscribe to my channel. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Crowder - All My Hope
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G Am C D7 A7
All My Hope by David Crowder. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: The Kiboomers - Columbus Day
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: F & C
Columbus Day by The Kiboomers! Integrate history / social studies / core subjects into your music class. It’s been raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. Their original video may be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-yzzCYJDPrQ .
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: The Youngbloods - Get Together
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: G F C D
Get Together by The Youngbloods. It’s been digitally lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. The lyric video was created by YouTuber “Chris' Lyrics” and I simply added the chords to their video.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. item.title: Bryan Adams - Summer Of '69
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Summer Of '69 - Bryan Adams
Using the chords: A Bb Bm C D F G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU DU DU or D DU U DU but try your own out too!
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Rihanna - Stay (Album Version)
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Stay on the ukulele by Rihanna. The chords used are C F G Am Dm.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Elvis Presley - Hound Dog
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Very Easy
Hound Dog - Elvis Presley Written by Jerry Leiber and Mike Stoller
Using the chords: C F G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Parachute - Lonely With Me
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Lonely With Me on the ukulele by Parachute. The chords used are C F G Am.
*Original in the Key of D
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: The Kingston Trio - Where Have All The Flowers Gone? (Remastered)
item.description:
For educational use. Chords Used: C Am F G
"Where Have All the Flowers Gone" by The Kingston Trio. It’s been digitally raised by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. The lyric video by YouTuber jasmine e may be found here (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bI3QVsW30j0), I just added the chords.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
